planet.name: HD 37605 b
Gaia DR2 3332911492327546368 b
TYC 127-402-1 b
HIP 26664 b
planet.description: The planetary system HD 37605 hosts at least two planets. The inner planet is on a 55 day orbit with a very high eccentricity of 0.6767. This planet was discovered in 2004. In 2012, another planet on a 2720 day orbit was announced. In contrast to the inner planet, HD 37605 c is on an almost circular orbit. This leads to interesting speculations on the origin of the planetary system.

Gaia DR2 3332911492327546368 c
TYC 127-402-1 c
HIP 26664 c
planet.description: The planetary system HD 37605 hosts at least two planets. The inner planet is on a 55 day orbit with a very high eccentricity of 0.6767. This planet was discovered in 2004. In 2012, another planet on a 2720 day orbit was anounced. In contrast to the inner planet, HD 37605 c is on an almost circular orbit. This leads to interesting speculations on the origin of the planetary system.
